actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 1 of H. Res. 1230. The next meeting is scheduled for 2:00 p.m. on November 29, 2022.
The House received a message from the Senate. The Senate passed S. 7, S. 1725, H.R. 1437 amended, H.R. 521, and H.R. 7132.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 4 of H. Res. 1464, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Debbie Dingell to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
